text:
Visited this new clinic for a checkup and it exceeded expectations. Dr Michael was patient, friendly and knowledgeable. I informed him that I was at risk of vasovagal syncope for the blood draw and he let me lie down for safety while talking me through the procedure. This really put me at ease and I did not have any anxiety whatsoever.

I especially appreciated the posters with transparent pricing and options around the clinic, which helped me to make an informed decision. Many other clinics have opaque pricing and checkup/treatment options; with AscendCare I did not feel awkward or unsure about choosing the best option for me with the doctor's advice.

The facilities were also clean and comfortable with friendly staff at the front desk. Highly recommended.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I had a fantastic experience here. Dr. Michael Yan is incredibly patient, knowledgeable, and truly cares about his patients. He took the time to listen to my concerns, explain everything in detail, and ensure I felt comfortable throughout my visit. The entire staff was friendly and professional, creating a welcoming and supportive environment. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for high-quality, compassionate care!

Our staff recently book an appointment for work permit checkup, and she was thoroughly impressed with the level of care and professionalism provided. The clinic staff was warm, attentive, and efficient. The clinic was clean, well-organized, and look cozy.

I had a great experience at Ascend Care Medical Clinic with Dr. Michael. He is very patient and takes the time to explain everything in detail, ensuring that all my questions are answered thoroughly.

The clinic itself is clean and has a comfortable, welcoming atmosphere. The staff are also very friendly and helpful, making the entire visit smooth and pleasant.

My appointment started on time, and Dr Michael took the time to listen to my concerns, explain the procedures clearly, and answer all my questions patiently. I appreciated the personalised approach and the genuine care shown throughout my visit.
